author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia Gov. Kemp reports massive fundraising haul over past six months

sentence: If 20-year career politician Brian Kemp spent half as much time protecting Georgia's elections as he does scheming to hold on to his office, we wouldn't be in this mess.? In a statement, Kemp's campaign spokesman, Cody Hall, said: It's no surprise that David Perdue and Stacey Abrams are joining forces to maintain the blatantly unfair status quo and continue raising money for their campaigns when the Governor is prohibited by law from doing so, solely because he is the incumbent during a legislative session.
title: Stacey Abrams, David Perdue call foul on GOP proposal to ban fundraising while Georgia legislature is in session

author: Murjani Rawls
title: Herschel Walker Leads Raphael Warnock In Early Georgia Senate Poll

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia Senate race: Herschel Walker lands endorsement of leading anti-abortion group

sentence: Sparks flew between former senator David Perdue and Georgia governor Brian Kemp at the GOP gubernatorial primary debate Thursday night.
author: Caroline Downey
title: Sparks Fly at Heated Georgia Debate Between Brian Kemp, David Perdue

sentence: "One of the problems also is if Brian Kemp gets in, I think it's going to be very, very hard for Herschel Walker to win," the former president said.
author: John L. Dorman
title: Trump says it will be 'very hard' for Herschel Walker to win the Georgia Senate race if Brian Kemp is the GOP gubernatorial nominee
